name: Kiwix
description: Offline content browser serving Wikipedia, Project Gutenberg, and more from ZIM archives

notes.text: Requires a bind-mounted directory with ZIM archives. Download some from https://library.kiwix.org to /your/zims. The installation command is then: `ZIM_DATA=/your/zims bash -c "$(curl .../ct/kiwix.sh)"`.
Ensure ZIM files are world-readable: chmod -R a+rX /your/zims
